misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki, is set to participate in his eighth Hector Trophée in 2025. As the younger brother of the esteemed Pasi, Eero has carved his own distinct path in the world of golf.

Known for his calculated approach and unwavering determination, Eero is a formidable competitor in both individual and pair formats. He has put in a lot of work recently to improve his mental game, and he now possesses a mental fortitude that few can match.
While the coveted Hector Trophée title has eluded him thus far, Eero has demonstrated exceptional skill by winning the Victor Trophy once, proving his mettle as an individual player.
Eero's presence at the Hector Trophée events is always anticipated, as he consistently brings a high level of competition and sportsmanship to the prestigious tournament.
